item.title: Python in Sublime Text 3 with Sublime REPL and Anaconda
item.description: A flexible, project-centered setup for data science In this tutorial you will learn how to link Sublime Text 3 to an environment from Anaconda/Miniconda and execute Python with SublimeREPL. You might already have existing projects with different conda virtual environments - no worries. This setup can be easily applied to any project that you already have. Photo by Keira Burton from Pexels TL;DR Open Sublime Text 3 and add the packages package control, SublimeREPL and Project Manager.
